data.text: I stayed in the hotel for 2 weeks and it was a nice hotel the rooms are clean and the breakfast was great! They are very accomodating they help me all the time whenever i needed it. The location is great and they have a nice facilities. Would definitely recommend this hotel.
data.title: 5 star!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Eslam E ,

Thank you ever very much for your complimenting review following your recent stay with us .It gives us great pleasure to read that you had a memorable experience with us.

We are indeed grateful for your kind words on the seamless level of service and quality experienced with all our team members throughout the hotel.

We look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future.

Best regards,
On behalf of the Grand Millennium Dubai team
owner_response.author: Mohamed Rashad

data.text: Stayed here in January. I was quite pleased with my room. I had a studio and it well Appointed in nicely laid out. The service from check in to check out was great. Breakfast was included in my package, and it was quite good. Restaurant service was also excellent. This is a nice hotel complemented by very good customer service. Hotel management was also very helpful. Location was very good since I did utilize metro. I was very pleased, especially for what I paid for the room. I think customer service really makes this at five star.
data.title: Nice visit in January

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Robert ,

Thank you for taking the time to share your comments on this website following your recent stay with us at The Grand Millennium Hotel Dubai .We are thrilled to read that your experience with us was so wonderful and I am proud to learn that our customer service made you experience five star .

Thank you once again for sharing such positive feedback with us. We certainly look forward to welcome you back in not too distant future.

Best regards,
On behalf of the Grand Millennium Dubai team
owner_response.author: Mohamed Rashad

data.text: It was a wonderful stay. Highly recommended hotel in Dubai. Hotel staff specially reception staff and housekeeping staff they are very professional and helpful. I would definitely come back with my family. Thank you Grand millinium for giving such a wonderful stay. Feels like a family. Hope as soon as possible we will meet you again.
data.title: Hats off grand millinium!! You are the top most among the hotel. When we think about Dubai, Grand millinium is my choice

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Salvin S w,

Thank you very much for having shared your experiences on TripAdvisor following your recent stay with us.

We are delighted that your overall experience of the hotel is a positive one and the service provided by our team , specially reception and housekeeping, contributed to an enjoyable stay, rest assured that your kind words will be shared.

Thank you once again for sharing such positive feedback with us. We certainly look forward to welcome you back in not too distant future.

Best regards,
On behalf of the Grand Millennium Dubai team
owner_response.author: Mohamed Rashad

data.text: It was great! We stayed here for a very long time. All the people was great and reception were all friendly. The concierge   They help us all the time. The room was very clean and the breakfast was great. We will definitely comeback here with my family.
data.title: Hotel stay was great!!!!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear B R,

What a pleasure it is to read your comments and to know that your time with us was so great!

It is rewarding to know how enjoyable your stay with us was, especially you were looked after by the Concierge team .

We're thrilled that all our team, specially reception were friendly and efficient and their service made a positive impression on you. 

We strive to offer exceptional service and it is truly rewarding to hear that we have achieved this. Thank you for the kind words about our team, cleanliness, and breakfast .

We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Perhaps for another great stay ?

Best regards,
On behalf of the Grand Millennium Dubai team
owner_response.author: Mohamed Rashad

data.text: Amazing team , Very good service and professional at the front desk Ms Eli and Ms Camille receive us with warm welcoming and provide us with many important details that help our vacation . Thank you for having us will definitely come back next visit to Dubai
data.title: Wonderful

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Hasan A,

Thank you very much for such a lovely and wonderful feedback. We appreciate such comments and felling proud to read it.

Our entire team is always there to ensure that each and every guests stay is made memorable . I am thrilled to see that Eli and Camille  have ensured that you are being looked after .

Thank you for choosing us and cant wait to welcome you back again for yet another memorable stay .

Best regards,
On behalf of the Grand Millennium Dubai team
owner_response.author: Mohamed Rashad
